channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Feds scrap proposal to offer cash to air passengers for flight disruptions
item.description: Transportation Department drops Biden-era proposal to require airlines to financially compensate passengers for flight disruptions.

item.title: RFK Jr. denies pressuring ousted CDC director to preapprove vaccine changes
item.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy denied pressuring the ousted CDC director to preapprove vaccine recommendations.

item.title: New earthquake hits Afghanistan as death toll from first rises to 2,205
item.description: The strong earthquake struck about 17 miles east of Jalalabad, near the border with Pakistan, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
